main event: On 7 July 1951 in Seoul, Korea, a military source reported seeing an object traveling at tremendous speed, observed as a large green ball turning to blue trailing sparks, categorized as a meteor sighting.
interesting points: The sighting was reported by a military source in Korea.
The object was observed as a large green ball turning to blue trailing sparks.
The object was traveling at a tremendous speed, resembling a meteor.
The report is from an 'AIR INTELLIGENCE INFORMATION REPORT' dated 1 July 1951.
The report is approved by Brigadier General, USAF, Deputy for Intelligence.
sighted object: one object resembling a large green ball turning to blue with trailing sparks
